pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorPhotosDetails(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {var photosurl = "https://api.flickr.com/services/rest/?&method=flickr.photosets.getPhotos&api_key=" +$routeParams.apikey + "&photoset_id=" + $routeParams.photosetid + "&media=photos&format=json&jsoncallback=JSON_CALLBACK";	$http.jsonp(photosurl).success(function(data) {$scope.photos = data.photoset.photo;var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);$scope.$apply();$.unblockUI();}).error ( function(data, status, headers, config) {$.unblockUI();apprise("Error occured. Please try again later.", {"verify":false, "textYes":"Ok"}, function(r) {$window.history.back();});});}

function pageprocessorPhotos(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) { $.blockUI();var url = "https://api.flickr.com/services/rest/?&method=flickr.photosets.getList&api_key=" + pagedef.apikey + "&user_id=" + pagedef.userid + "&format=json&jsoncallback=JSON_CALLBACK";$scope.apikey=pagedef.apikey;$http.jsonp(url).success(function(data) {$scope.photos = data.photosets.photoset;var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);$.unblockUI();}).error ( function(data, status, headers, config) {$.unblockUI();apprise("Error occured. Please try again later.", {"verify":false, "textYes":"Ok"}, function(r) {$window.history.back();});});;}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorVideosVideosDetails(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope,$sce, $window, $location) { var video = $rootScope.videos[$routeParams.index];$scope.video = video; $scope.title=video.title.$t;var temp = video.id.$t;var tempId = temp.substring(temp.lastIndexOf("/") + 1);$scope.id = tempId;$scope.trustSrc = function() {return $sce.trustAsResourceUrl("http://www.youtube.com/embed/" + tempId);};$scope.description=video.media$group.media$description.$t;var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorVideos(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) { $.blockUI();$http.get(pagedef.url).success( function(data) {$scope.videos = data.feed.entry;$rootScope.videos = data.feed.entry;var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);$.unblockUI();}).error ( function(data) {$.unblockUI();});}

function pageprocessorTwitter(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) { var iabRef = window.open(pagedef.url, "_blank", "location=no"); var iabClose = function(data) {window.location.href="index.html#home";};iabRef.addEventListener("exit", iabClose);}

function pageprocessorNews(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {$.blockUI();var feed = new google.feeds.Feed(pagedef.url);feed.setNumEntries(-1);feed.setResultFormat(google.feeds.Feed.JSON);feed.load(function(result) {if(!result.error) {$scope.feeds=result.feed.entries;$rootScope.feeds = result.feed.entries;var data = '
';data = $(data).append($(pagedef.datatemplate));var data1 = $compile($(data))($scope);$('#appContent').append(data1);$scope.$apply();$.unblockUI();}});}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorNewsDetails(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {$scope.feed =  $rootScope.feeds[$routeParams.index];$scope.openurl = function() {window.open($scope.feed.link, "_blank", "location=no");};var template = pagedef.datatemplate;var data1 = $compile($(template))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);}

function pageprocessorEvents(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {$.blockUI();var url = pagedef.url;if(window.device) {}else {url = "/websimulator/xml?url=" + pagedef.url;}$http.get(url, {"responseType" : "xml","transformResponse" : function(data) {var jsonData = $.xml2json(data);return jsonData;} } ).success(function(results){var data = [];var index = 0;$.each(results.channel.item, function(key,val) {index = index+1;data.push({"link" : val.link,"displaydate" : val.pubDate, "date" : new Date(val.pubDate).getTime().toString(), "title" : val.title, "description" : val.description, "index" : index});});$rootScope.Eventsdata = data;$("#appContent").append($(pagedef.pageTemplate));$("#EventsListData").eventCalendar({jsonData: data,showDescription : true,dataTemplate : pagedef.datatemplate});$.unblockUI();}).error ( function(data, status, headers, config) {$.unblockUI();apprise("Error occured. Please try again later.", {"verify":false, "textYes":"Ok"}, function(r) {$window.history.back();});});}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorEventsDetails(pagedef,$scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {$scope.title = $routeParams.title;$scope.displaydate  = $routeParams.displaydate;$scope.description = $rootScope.Eventsdata[$routeParams.index].description;$scope.link = $routeParams.link;$scope.openurl = function() {window.open($scope.link, "_blank", "location=no");};var data = pagedef.pageTemplate;data = $(data).append($(pagedef.datatemplate));var data1 = $compile($(data))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);$scope.$apply();}

function pageprocessorFacebook(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) { var iabRef = window.open(pagedef.url, "_blank", "location=no"); var iabClose = function(data) {window.location.href="index.html#home";};iabRef.addEventListener("exit", iabClose);}

function pageprocessorDirectoryDetails(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {$scope.DirectoryDetails =  $rootScope.DirectoryResult[$routeParams.index];var template = pagedef.datatemplate;var data1 = $compile($(template))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorDirectory(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {$scope.resultfound = true;var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);$scope.fetched = false;$scope.filterresult = function() {var searchTxt = $("#Directorytxt").val();$rootScope.Directoryval = searchTxt;var results = [];var patt = new RegExp(searchTxt, "i");var filterParams = pagedef.searchfields.split(",");$.each($scope.DirectoryList.SR_DIRECTORY, function(index, val){var found=false;for(var i=0;i<filterParams.length;i++) {if(val[ "" + filterParams[i] + ""].match(patt)) {found=true;break;}}if(found) {results.push(val);}});$rootScope.DirectoryResult = results;if(results.length > 0) {$scope.resultfound = true;}else {$scope.resultfound = false;}   };$scope.search = function() {if($scope.fetched == false) {$.blockUI();var url = pagedef.url;if(window.device) {}else {url = "/websimulator/xml?url=" + pagedef.url;}var xhr=$.ajax({url: url,dataType:"xml",async:true,data:{},success: function(resp){try {var results = $.xml2json(resp);$scope.fetched = true;$scope.DirectoryList = results;$scope.filterresult();$scope.$apply();$.unblockUI();}catch(E) {alert ("Exception : " + E);}},error: function(e) {alert ("Error : " + e);$.unblockUI();apprise("Error occured. Please try again later.", {"verify":false, "textYes":"Ok"}, function(r) {$window.history.back();});}});}else {$scope.filterresult();}}}

function pageprocessorMoodle(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) { var iabRef = window.open(pagedef.url, "_blank", "location=no"); var iabClose = function(data) {window.location.href="index.html#home";};iabRef.addEventListener("exit", iabClose);}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorCourses(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {$scope.resultfound = true;var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);$scope.fetched = false;$scope.filterresult = function() {var searchTxt = $("#Coursestxt").val();$rootScope.Coursesval = searchTxt;var results = [];var patt = new RegExp(searchTxt, "i");var filterParams = pagedef.searchfields.split(",");$.each($scope.CoursesList.item, function(index, val){var found=false;for(var i=0;i<filterParams.length;i++) {if(val[ "" + filterParams[i] + ""].match(patt)) {found=true;break;}}if(found) {results.push(val);}});$rootScope.CoursesResult = results;if(results.length > 0) {$scope.resultfound = true;}else {$scope.resultfound = false;}   };$scope.search = function() {if($scope.fetched == false) {$.blockUI();var url = pagedef.url;if(window.device) {}else {url = "/websimulator/xml?url=" + pagedef.url;}var xhr=$.ajax({url: url,dataType:"xml",async:true,data:{},success: function(resp){try {var results = $.xml2json(resp);$scope.fetched = true;$scope.CoursesList = results;$scope.filterresult();$scope.$apply();$.unblockUI();}catch(E) {alert ("Exception : " + E);}},error: function(e) {alert ("Error : " + e);$.unblockUI();apprise("Error occured. Please try again later.", {"verify":false, "textYes":"Ok"}, function(r) {$window.history.back();});}});}else {$scope.filterresult();}}}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorSocial(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {var appnames = pagedef.appnames.split(",");var results = [];for(var i=0;i<appnames.length;i++) {for(var j=0;j<$rootScope.apps.length;j++) {if($rootScope.apps[j].displayname == appnames[i]) {results.push($rootScope.apps[j]);  }}}$scope.groupapps = results;var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);}
